name: Eagle Eyes
benefit: You ignore up to –5 in penalties due to distance on visual Perception checks, allowing you to see accurately at much greater distances than most.
mythicText: You eyesight rivals that of the most far-seeing raptors.
mythicBenefit: You ignore up to –10 in penalties due to distance on visual Perception checks, instead of the normal –5. As a swift action, you can expend one use of mythic power to ignore all penalties due to distance on visual Perception checks for 1 round.
prerequisites_zh: 感知13，【敏锐感官】种族特性。
benefit_zh: 在通过视觉进行察觉检定时，你忽略至多5点距离造成的减值，这使得你比大多数人看得更远更准确。
mythicText_zh: 你的视力堪比目光最为锐利的猛禽。
mythicBenefit_zh: 通过视力进行察觉检定时，你能够忽略至多10点距离造成的减值，取代原本的5点。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，在1轮内，你以视力进行察觉检定时能够忽略所有距离造成的惩罚。
